attributes.action: Oppose the creation of a seperate Tamil state in Sri-Lanka
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many fair minded Sri-Lankans in the UK request that the Prime Minster

1. Take action and work with the UN and Sri-Lankan Government to prevent the creation of seperate Tamil state in Sri-Lanka based on ethnic nationalism.

2. To encourage the Sri-Lankan Government to support the creation of a federal system (devolution) that is based on democractic election involving all tamil parties and not the LTTE

3. To condemn the terrorist actions of the LTTE in murdering innocent civilians (across all communities) in Sri-Lanka.

4. To condemn the actions of the LTTE in forcing Tamil Civilians to remain in Northern Sri-Lanka and fight against their will.

Thank-you
